title: Update bug?
body:
half the time i open the game after starting up my computer it confusingly reverts back to an old version due to an "error" then needs to "re download" the update which then doesnt install and the game suddenly runs fine and smoothly after a few minutes of repeatedly "updating
anyone else have this odd issue?

as of right now i have 15 minutes to wait for an update to download that i dont need because i just finished a game 20 minutes ago and just started the game up again

and who knows if this "update will do anything once completed but sit there til i press the x and restart the game in hopes it works

replies.body: Sometimes the client will force a repatch on itself if it notices that some game files are missing or damaged. If this keeps happening over and over, it might mean that your network is missing a critical patch file somewhere along the way. You can also try using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the *force repatch* option turned on for a better chance of it working correctly.
